data.englishTranslation: With the Name of Allah. O Allah, keep the Devil away from us and keep the Devil away from that which You provide for us.
data.transliteration: Bismillaah. Allaahumma jannibnash-Shaytaana, wa jannibish-Shaytaana maa razaqtanaa.
data.arabicVerse: بِسْمِاللَّهِ، اللَّهُمَّ جَنِّبْنَا الشَّيْطَانَ، وَجَنِّبِ الشَّيْطَانَ مَا رَزَقْـتَنَا
